holidays.title: Library Snap Shot Day

holidays.description: From riches to riches, learn all about the humble one cent.

holidays.title: National Sourdough Bread Day

holidays.title: St. Stupid Day
holidays.description: If you want to improve, be content with being thought foolish and stupid.
